metadata.title: CVE-2016-9116 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
NULL Pointer Access in function imagetopnm of convert.c:2226(jp2) inOpenJPEG 2.1.2. Impact is Denial of Service. Someone must open a craftedj2k file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjp2-7 - 2.2.0-1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip-server - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip7 - 2.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-1').
